name: FORMULA NEGATIVE ONE
description:
Go for the fastest time in a high-speed, 5-lap race in a futuristic vehicle (a triangle)!

Learn the track in the first lap, and starting on the second lap hold space whenever you want to boost. 

WARNING: Your boost meter (upper right) is also your health bar! Be careful! This bar can be refilled in the pink area near the finish line.

TIPS:

-Releasing the accelerator improves grip. Try tapping it while cornering

-Be sure you have enough speed before hitting the jump!

CONTROLS:

W - Go forwards

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

Left Arrow - Strafe Left

Right Arrow - Strafe Right

Space Bar - Hold for a boost (Lap two onwards)

R - Restart

You can also use a Switch controller, such as the NSO SNES controller.

CREDITS:

Programming - Me

Music - Centurion_of_war

Explosion - BenHickling

Boost sound - Kevin Payne

Ship Model - Kenney.nl
